title: 3D Vision Stopped Turning On
body:
My 3d vision would turn on sometimes when the game launches and sometimes not. Now it doesn't work at all and I've rebooted client/computer. Any idea what will get my game working in 3D Vision again please ?

 Thanks

QuantumZX

replies.body: We don't currently officially support 3D.  You might find options for this through your video card or Streoscopic 3D and you can certainly try running it, but we wouldn't be able to offer much support if something went wrong.  I'm glad it's working out for you now nevertheless!
Well it seems to be working again but I hope Riot Games can make it run every time.
